version_description:
Welcome to Epic Skater!

Battle across 10 different leaderboards to show off your gnarliest combos!

Welcome to Epic Skater!

Battle across 10 different leaderboards to show off your gnarliest combos!

Welcome to Epic Skater!

Battle across 10 different leaderboards to show off your gnarliest combos!

Happy St. Patrick's Day!
*Skate as Patty!
*New skate spots in the mix.
*Stability and bug fixes.
*Big green top hats are temporarily part of each of your outfits.  Let's go dancing.
*Fixed an issue with Offers where some users weren't properly credited.

Happy St. Patrick's Day!
*Skate as Patty!

*Stability and bug fixes.
*Big green top hats are temporarily part of each of your outfits.  Let's go dancing.
*Fixed an issue with Offers where some users weren't properly credited.

* The Easter spirit is here in Epicwood!
* Play as Peter Cottonbail and his signature deck, "Sunny Slide Up".
* Every outfit is temporarily equipped with festive bunny heads, ears, and cottontails to celebrate!
* Thanks for playing!

*4th of July Update!
*It's night time on the Fourth of July, watch for added fireworks and epic cameras!
*Uncle Slappy and United Skates are here.
*Fixed audio bugs.
*Save Battery Support in Settings.

Epic Skater's holiday update has arrived!

*It's snowing in Epicwood! Happy Holidays!
*New achievements! Can you reach level 25?

Got rid of the Holiday fever. Happy New Year!
Got rid of the Holiday fever. Happy New Year!
Got rid of the Holiday fever. Happy New Year!

After over two years of bringing the pure excitement of skating to players, Epic Skater returns with its biggest update yet!

*Epicwood just got more Epic!  Level up to unlock new endless skate spots and skate the mines, clouds, underground, lab, and along Venus Beach's Boardwalk!
*Play with new skater outfits.
*Balance meters have been added and scoring has been rebalanced. To balance, continue holding the screen and drag your finger to the left or right.
*New Buyer package now comes with a Coin Doubler Outfit!
*Number of Skatetricks in a combo will now multiply your base score for astronomical scores!
*New Me Menu!
*Epic Camera Moments can now be toggled on or off from the settings menu.
